summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley discussing a London trip. The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the information may be privileged and is intended solely for the recipient. The communication suggests a personal or professional relationship between Epstein and Staley.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is the sender of the email, discussing a trip with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is the recipient of the email, which references a trip he took to London.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley appear to have a personal or professional relationship, as indicated by the informal nature of the email discussing a trip.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein sent the email to Jes Staley discussing Staley's trip to London.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating potential attorney-client privilege.
